text: Mike Harris (born 6 May 1969) is a British rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:British male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Great Britain Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Barry, Vale of Glamorgan
title: Mike Harris (rower)
